medications: Metformin ER 1000 mg BID; Atorvastatin 20 mg daily
narrative_note: 58-year-old Male with a history of type 2 diabetes diagnosed 10 years ago. Seen for routine outpatient follow-up. Reports no acute complaints. Current therapy: Metformin ER 1000 mg BID; Atorvastatin 20 mg daily. Home glucose readings: fasting 140–190 mg/dL. Comorbidities: hypertension; dyslipidemia. Denies hypoglycemia requiring assistance. Last HbA1c on 2025-10-08 was 6.4%. Plan: optimize regimen and follow-up in 8–12 weeks. Not eligible for cohort due to: HbA1c below inclusion range (6.4%).
